Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @CryptoJesus make a new secure seed phrase here, grab an address, and all funds out of agama: https://wallet.myhush.org/ Then work on getting a more secure local full node wallet. But don't wait to move funds, move them now

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I don't like to tell people to use the web wallet for large amounts, but this is different. The web wallet is more secure than Agama right now. An attacker is actively draining funds. KMD pre-drained many funds, but the attacker is still draining others.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> KMD saved almost 100 BTC from being stolen by doing this, and 8M KMD
